mapper.sql: fid, path, author_id, file_status, name, file_type, created_time, modified_time, download_count, file_size
mapper.select: select * from file order by created_time DESC
select * from file where author_id = #{authorId} order by created_time DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into file
fid,
path,
author_id,
file_status,
name,
file_type,
created_time,
modified_time,
download_count,
file_size,

mapper.update:
update file
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_status = #{fileStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update file set path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_status = #{fileStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, download_count = #{downloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
